name: Eclipse (redmoth)
description:
Download now Available!

Eclipse is an action RPG about a mystical cat investigating a group of suspicious mice.

-Attack, defend and cast spells as you chase mouses in  fast paced combat.

-Fight all kinds of enemies, from small mice to towering bosses.

-Collect and combine Kibble items to unlock unique, powerful and dynamic spell combinations.

-Play as a fluffy cat with many movement options as well  as vicious claws and magical properties.

Controls:

Tab - Lock on nearest enemy / stop locking on

WASD - move

Left Mouse button - Basic attack (hold for a short duration for a power attack)

Right mouse button - Run

Left Shift - Roll

Q - Guard

E - Cast Ability in slot 1

R - Cast Ability in slot 2
